review: 对象嫌给的少，然后跑了，之后她发现，自己的生活质量大不如从前，于是就寻思着丢块骨头找个舔狗
我的评价是：rnm，退钱
账号验证就是一坨屎，登陆时间比游玩时间还长，暴雪就是一脑瘫，ow是个好游戏，可惜是被暴雪开发，祝暴雪全家暴毙，点赞的各位宾州长5厘米，靠迪克的寿命少五年
可惜可惜，曾经的最爱
彼阳的晚意，初升的东西，春纯的消愁，振筝的飞物。
垃圾暴雪 去司吧

游戏是一个好游戏，可是运营公司真的是利益遮蔽了双眼，只认钱啊，曾经的忠实中国区玩家，现在恨不得暴雪赶紧被微软收购掉，然后直接原地解散。曾经16年夏天那段玩ow的时间依然是我脑海中最美好的记忆，一起和好基友上分，打快速娱乐。暴雪司马玩意，早日财报暴跌，被动视踢出，网易收购！
The game is a good game, but the operating company's interests have really overshadowed its focus on money. Once a loyal player in China, Blizzard would love to be quickly acquired by Microsoft and then disbanded in place. The time I spent playing 'ow' in the summer of 2016 is still the most beautiful memory in my mind, sharing points with good friends and playing fast entertainment together. Blizzard Sima Gadget, with a sharp decline in financial reports as soon as possible, passively kicked out, acquired by NetEase!

狠狠超市考迪克那不存在的木琴
破案了，鼠鼠每次打胶都在超，因为考迪克的木琴的骨灰早就飞了
**游戏滚出我电脑儿！再也不是连着5周通宵玩的游戏了，早知道有成就就不登陆了。越来越奇怪的游戏界面，吃相越来越难看，守望先锋：归西狗都不玩！
so ATVI,FK U

守望先锋多彩画，
玩家投入感情不值那。
更新迟缓成问题多，
心情起伏如海浪搅。

英雄各异虽有趣，
但平衡调整频频来。
付出时间与热情，
却得不到公平交换。

宣传虚华过于多，
实际内容难显现。
玩家投入情感深，
暴雪能不能死全家。
for persian gamers : 10 az 10 behtarin game to in sabk

Omegaquatsch 2 
Playtime: 1200 Hours

I am very happy to finally write a review for this.
This game is the biggest garbage the digital world has seen in the last decade. I strongly regret buying OW on release not because the game was shit back then but because they turned this game into a burning pile of shit patch by patch, hero by hero. 

Unbiased this game already is a toxic cesspool causing harm to human society - but if you read all the patch notes you naturally have to come to the conclusion that the devs are just clowns who cant even tell left from right. This game should have never cost any money in the first place.

Since i can not get my money back and looking at the current state of the game i almost wish i would at least still have Overwatch 1...

Ahh...yes the negative reviews. For me the game is quite enjoyable tho..just one thing to note that if you want to play the full story mode then you need to put some $$$ in or micro-transactions stuff. 
I will put a negative review here, but do I still play this game?? Yes, ofc just like the rest of the OW community lol..

J'ai essayé le Jeu pour lui donner une chance pour voir malheureusement... Il m'a bien déçu, je lui trouve mal équilibre " avis personnelle " je ne recommande pas.

Il y a au moins des points positifs :


1 : il est gratuit.
2 : le mode entraînement pour les novices.
3 : ... C'est tout.

As much as I love this game, it does NOT deserve a positive review. Somethiing that could've been the best hero shooter ever released got destroyed by greedy companies, lies, and terrible decisions.

Battle net üzerinden yorum yazamıyorduk, şimdi bu oyuna sövebilirim.




1. oyunda dandik sandıktan çıkan kostümü almak istiyorsun ama paran yok? O zaman bize 300 tl cart curt ver.
Üstüne üstlük, girişlerin problemli olması, Battle Net versiyonunda olan dillerin Steam versiyonunda olmaması.
Cart curt, gidin mâlum siteden izleyin, yada patreon aracılığı ile istediğiniz karakteri, istediğiniz şekillerde izleyebilirsiniz.
垃圾游戏，望暴雪全家暴毙身亡，

Playing Overwatch feels like being in a predatory, abusive relationship that you're only staying in entirely because of the happiness the relationship provided you once upon a time.

I was ranked 72nd in Europe back in Overwatch 1's Season 4 (this was the peak rank of any game i've ever played). My entire life was Library > Overwatch > Sleep during my final year of university. I got so good at the game and playing Mercy that I was dreaming about it while I was sleeping. It was like a full-time relationship.

Skip years ahead. The same relationship has broken with false promises, neglect and downright abusive greed. The game expects you to put your hands in your pockets - the same game which was creatively made on the back of 'justice' and doing the right thing. 

This game is morally bankrupt. And it used to be the most beautiful experience we had.

Edit: Blizzard so lazy that they ruined their reputation for microtransactions but still haven't even added more weapon skins in the game than the Golden one.
已经结束嘞！！！
玩了一个小时，没什么改变，匹配两分钟就能开，不错给你好评

What a great game, sure hope all the PVE missions come out soon!

组团烤烤迪克的迪克（1/114514）
献给我六年的快乐时光

首先，steam是个美国软件，你花的每一笔钱都在给美国政府缴税，这不是妥妥的资敌吗？万一以后中美开战，你交的这笔税说不定就会成为压倒我们的最后一枚子弹，那你就是民族罪人了。

其次，steam上的游戏绝大多数都是外国游戏，里面不仅包含了色情暴力内容，甚至充满了西方的反动思想，长期游玩会迷惑你的心智，导致你萎靡不振不思进取，最终危害你为国家建设贡献力量。

最后，如果你真的想玩游戏，我推荐你去玩米哈游的游戏，作为国内数一数二的游戏大厂，在他旗下有《原神》《崩坏3》《崩坏:星穹铁道》等知名游戏，在全世界都是非常有知名度的。游戏画面精美细致，玩法新颖具有创意，在艺术立意上更是体现了浓浓的中华风范，得到了广大中国人民的认可。其营收更是在今年拿下了265亿美元，可见全球玩家对其的喜爱之深。其游戏内部的充值价格也非常公道，才648元，你少吃两餐饭就可以攒到了。

所以，与其把钱捐给美帝，不如献给米哈游，不仅自己玩的开心，又能为国效力，岂不美哉?

作为从这款游戏发售开始就玩的 老玩家 ow1打到过百强 ow2打到过百强 对于暴雪就是极度的恨 游戏是好游戏 但是已经被暴雪弄死了 从说要弄2开始 一个承诺没有兑现 从说要主要pve开始 到现在pve出来一坨屎 天赋树没了 而且pve还是阉割版 从最开始的神话皮肤源氏 第一款神话是 两把武器 三款皮肤 三个配饰 三种颜色  从源氏的全特效 到女王开始基本上没特效 都是很小的粒子  到这个赛季的安娜 基本没特效 没配饰 ow的神话越来越敷衍 暴雪越来越不要脸 有的暴雪舔狗会说 特效挡视野 我挡你老母 源氏的神话怎么就有特效？怎么不挡视野？明明可以改技能 开火颜色就可以的 对于新玩家来说  可以玩这游戏 图个新鲜 但是一定不要 充钱 一定不要给不尊重玩家 敷衍玩家的 公司给一分钱

还是我来说句公道话吧,我看到评论区大部分人都在骂暴雪公司。我想说的是还有一小部分人都干嘛去了，是没手机还是没键盘，不敢骂吗？不骂你丁丁永远长不长
Let me be fair. I see that most people in the comment area are scolding Blizzard. What I want to say is ，what are you doing,another small number of people .no  mobile phone or no keyboard？ why donot to scold Blizzard ？Tintin will never grow up without scolding Blizzard
去你妈的臭逼游戏，傻逼玩意，狗才玩
暴雪把一个好IP做烂了

游戏是好游戏
公司不是好公司

Overwatch 2 le jeu de la honte, un jeu initialement supposé être PVE avec arbre de compétence etc, fini par être un Overwatch 1 bis avec aujourd'hui du contenu PVE vendu au prix fort mais surtout au compte goutte. 15 euro pour 1h d’expérience PVE après 1 an de développement hasardeux c'est une honte.
I hate this game (I play it every day)
Fucking horrible game that is sparsely scattered with new content that's soul purpose is to fuel more micro transactions, I don't see this game surviving next year
just a piece of s**t.

16年上初中时候从GTV游戏竞技频道看到守望的视频，当时真的是从牙缝里抠出来那328买的ow1，也见识到了16年暑假那万人空巷的ow全盛时代，断断续续的玩到年初国服停运，那个时候真的是惊艳了当时还在玩喜爱福和蛋拐的我，说真的其实我挺喜欢ow这个游戏的，也忘不了初中那一段周末晚上和朋友一起开黑的日子和欢乐，但是就因为死妈暴雪和死妈烤迪克不把中国玩家当人看，owl棒子选手乳化官方屁都不放一个。单方面关停国服以后，先是在你家那破平台开放vx和zfb，又上线steam，这不就是”当初是你要分开分开就分开，现在又要用真爱把我哄回来”吗，暴雪啊暴雪可真有你的啊，其他想要入坑的hxd们，听我这个算是老玩家的玩家一句劝：玩随便，但别给暴雪氪一块钱了，因为当初承载着我们青春的那个守望永远回不来了，现在的这个游戏只是垃圾暴雪骗氪的工具
还是当年守望发售时的那句话：这个世界需要更多的英雄
希望看到这条评论的hxd们都能成为这个世界需要的英雄
头一次在评论里面打这么多字
不用多说
The people who make Overwatch porn work harder than the people who make Overwatch

Empecé a jugar Overwatch a sus inicios.
Era un juego divertido, entretenido y prometedor. (En serio, parece increíble, pero por aquella lo era).
Sin embargo, pasaba el tiempo y el juego seguía exactamente igual que a sus inicios. Todo el lore que nos estaban prometiendo, eventos y demás no daban salido y jugar 4 años seguidos a Junkerstein empezaba a oler mal.
Cuando la gente se empezó a aburrir y a dejar de jugar, pusieron una nueva excusa para alargar la espera: Overwatch 2 estaba en desarrollo y por eso mismo no teníamos contenido.
A este punto ya era completa falta de respeto hacia los jugadores.
No contentos con eso, empezaron los nerfeos y buffs absurdos a los personajes, skins de pago cuando en un inicio dijeron que todo iba a poder conseguirse de forma gratuita, la nula atención a sus jugadores de a pie, solo centrándose en los profesionales  y lo peor de todo, se descubrieron los casos de @abuso y viol@ciones a sus empleadas. Acabando en suicidios.
Qué tenemos ahora? El cadáver desenterrado de Overwatch 1, de que sigue tomando a la gente por gilipoll@s y no es más que el mismo juego pero ahora pidiéndote la cartera para cualquier cosa.
Un juego con muchísimo potencial donde se las apañaron para destruirlo de manera bestial en tan poco tiempo.

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

I don't know what Blizzard was expecting releasing this on Steam, and it looks like they're desperate to get more players after they massively destroyed the game. Overwatch 1 was a solid success and a well-done Hero-Shooter, they even managed to get the GOTY title of 2016. Unfortunately, the higher a man reaches, the lower he falls. They announced Overwatch 2 as a PVE,PVP Hero - shooter and all they did was ruin a game that could beat TF2 by giving us 1-1 copy of Overwatch 1 with differend title Overwatch 2. such a shame but what else do you expect from Blizzard, they only care about Diablo.
